ValidationRule.description: Makes sure RPC's are populating a desired plan start date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Ancillary Billing Hourly Rate")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Ancillary Billing Flat Fee")) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && RecordTypeId <> "01237000000RiPn" && RecordTypeId <> "01237000000Xsu6" && ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)" ) && ( ISBLANK(Desired_Plan_Start_Date__c) = TRUE ) && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the plan's desired plan start date.
